content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1503345026539{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]We attend to patients with Ear, Nose and throat complaints as well as other head and Neck Problems.

Our out-patient clinic runs every Monday, Wednesday and Saturdays. We have an ENT  on call in case of emergencies.

We perform a wide range of ENT procedures and surgeries including tonsillectomies, neck surgeries, Endoscopic Sinus Surgery (ESS), Endoscopic Ear surgery and many other surgeries.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Monday 3:00 PM – 6:00 PM

Wednesday 3:00 PM – 6:00 PM

Friday 3:00 PM – 6:00 PM

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5214″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5228″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
